Articles.Content:
I keep getting crashes to desktop. I posted my logs to dropbox. Soprry none of the text posting sites seem to work well for me.

I am trying interstellar. I bey there is a mod compatibility issue of some kind. It was working fine and I added some mods (sorry forget which specific ones, though I tried removing a few) and then I started having issues.

I'd really appreciate any help.

[url]https://www.dropbox.com/sh/i6t2q63guzf90qh/AADBmAQorV3eYkw--xhdhP5Za?dl=0[/url]

Action Group Manager (ActionGroupManager 1.4.0)

As it said... out of memory. You have too many resource hungry mods installed.

[quote name='*Aqua*']As it said... out of memory. You have too many resource hungry mods installed.[/QUOTE]


Ahh bummer! I finally got a nice laptop and still crashy crashy. If only KSP worked in 64 bit : (
